reviewText: How can you have a course on this platform about what to do in the virtual classroom when the advice is not followed.  You cannot get a hold of anyone, and there is no discussion board.  Boo!  You are supposed to pay for a certificate, but you cannot get a certificate because it is impossible to complete the peer reviews.  Lame

No option of completing the course without paying. So why do you call your site FREE online courses? And why do we have to go into the trouble of attending the class and watching the videos, and reading the material without being capable of at least watching our results in assignments?

I work at an university of applied sciences and this course is still rather basic. It would have been great if they would have made the extra step, not only covering how a proper grade book should be set-up, but also what type of assessments should be included and in which way in order to make it a valid assessment tool. For instance, if I would build a MC exam test bank, how many questions should be in there, when would you give students more opportunities and why? And how to create an online test bank easiest? Some tips and tricks would have been great. I also missed how you could add more of a personalized way of assessing people online. And how to design proper online peer reviews and when is it valid to add the outcome to the final grade? So for the very basics, this is a good class to start, but if you wish more, I would not  it.
only a small portion was applicable to my country and school environment
A rather decent course, but it is a step below compared with the first 3 courses

I think there is much room for improvement in this particular Module [Module #4]. My expectations were to gain knowledge of actual technological applications that can be used to assess online assignments. Plus, I expected to see samples of technology used to assess assignments [e.g., a YouTube video demonstrating how an LMS, like Canvas, can be used to size-up a student's standing in the course, and how extra credit might work within an LMS.] Being that Coursera is a learning program to learn how to teach ONLINE, I expected we would receive concrete information on how this can best be accomplished in the 21st century. Even to direct us to valuable external websites for additional learning, regarding Performance and Assessments, would have been a significant improvement for this Module 4. Other than this, the instructor, Racquel Stephens, seems like a lovely individual and one who is thoughtful and clear in the instructions she put forth. Thank you.
Es un curso muy completo, sin embargo, no es de facil acceso para las personas que no dominan el idioma ingles.
Strengthen and add extra knowledge to the teaching professionals.  thumbs up!
The course is good. But the question and answer part is not stringent. The answers to questions are predictable. This can be re-processed.
Very well planned and delivered online course. Really helpful for my current service.
Course is really helpful to understand different types of students and also how to assess them virtually.
This course allowed me to rethink on online evaluation. But the course could have incorporated some online evaluation technologies. Over all, it was impressive.
The course is very useful. I would suggest to concentrate less in the grading and more in the engagement and integrity of assessment of online courses.
I really liked the content of the third week. But I think the quizzes are too easy this time. Could have been complex like in the first 2 courses. They really gave me hell. :)
Great hands-on especially the grade book. I would recommend that everyone even those who are involved with undergraduates do attend this course. As the principles are the same.
The course was informative especially on the analysis of a grade book. However, there are a number of reading links that do not work.
Excellent information presented, high quality PPTs and resources. Information on technology needs to be updated since classroom tech is advancing so quickly.

Although the domain of performance
assessment in the virtual classroom was completely new to me, taking this
course made me feel fully equipped with the knowledge and the applicable strategies
to succeed in any project that relates to the field. The peer-graded assessment
was the best part of all, because it helped me put everything together.
Material is explained well and the comprehension checks along the way are helpful.

Really helpful course, though discussion forums seemed to be available at the end of the course, they wasn´t really available. Presentations sometimes ask you to go to those unavailable forums. Teacher was great (and has the same name as my mom :D)  But had some grading issues with 2 questions on quizes

I really enjoyed the mathematical point and percentage explanation and the tools to grade assignments enlightening . I always have struggled with the math of grading. I felt that the first and second weeks were very repetitive information; therefore I didn't give it a five star. Otherwise, I thought it was good information. Thanks
this course is very helpful in the 21 century because the world of technology is improving fast
was taught  very intresting topics in this course love it gain alot

Excelente, reald and goes straight to our reality. Congrtulations for all the staff, the UCI and Coursera for the best quality.
Thank you for the opportunity to take this Specialization course.
R​ealmente muy importante la realidad de las evaluaciones en lníea.
The content is very good and enjoyed every bit of this course.
This has been an upgrade for my professional performance
I gain lots aof insights on this subject. Very great help for this new normal education.
This course helped me to learn some concepts in virtual teaching performance assessment. I think now I can grade my students in a much systematic manner.
Very good course to take. Maximize your learning by checking out all the links they provide for optional reading.
Very Informative about how to handle different types of learners
It's nice to end up my specialization with this course it helps me to map-out necessary things so that I will be guided in classroom settings.
Even though this course was not easy to complete, I do have to say that I've learned quite a lot and I've acquired some very useful skills along the way :)
Well explained concepts and easily understood

The title of this course is absolutely precise. Indeed, I learnt about performance evaluation in a virtual setting. The interesting feature of this course was the peer assignment on gradebook management. Proctor route of assessment is one point which can be emphasized to further enhance this course. Overall, I had fun learning and appreciate the instructor for providing an insight into her teaching strategies & experiences
Very informative and very significant learning during this  new normal. Thank you Professor Hernandez
AN EXCELLENT COURSE FOR THE TEACHERS
very informative, well-spaced and fruitful course. especially the instructor was very experienced and know to teach
Nice course . Thanks to the facilitator. brilliant
this was an eye opener. Most of the time you follow but there are wide variety of concepts which you need to keep in mind while evaluating.
Really this course will be very beneficial in our professional life
good experience to have new virtual assessments and performance tips.
the course has justified the value addition
Great course! Learning about  grade book integrity has changed my outlook on the assignments I provide and how  I categorize my own grade book. Thanks.

I LOVE THE DISCUSSION. EACH VIDEO IS VERY EASY TO UNDERSTAND AND THE CONCEPTS BEING DISCUSSED SOMEHOW REPEATEDLY APPEARED AND HAS BEEN REPEATEDLY USED IN EACH MODULE -- ALLOWING ME TO MASTER THE CONCEPTS AND IDEA IN ASSESSMENT.
Module 3 was the most helpful. The week assignment was excellent. I learned things I never thought I need improvement in. Thanks so much!
Excellent Course. It provides in depth knowledge to the instructor. The course explains each concept clearly
The content is wonderful. I will be able to be a great virtual teacher thanks to the guide I got from this course.

I gained so much from taking this course. I especially appreciate the materials presented that touched on statistical analysis of the grade book. I will most definitely use the tips the instructor gave on adding feedback in the virtual c
An excellent course with examples and the own experience of the teacher who shares in each lesson.

I found our instructor to be effective, and this course to be well taught and administered. The instructional material was an excellent preparation for the assessment, which made it a guide and model in addition to being a good course. If six stars were statistically permissible, I would have given six stars.
